newsitem.title: CHINA: Shanghai Tyre and Rubber 1996 net reverses loss.
newsitem.headline: Shanghai Tyre and Rubber 1996 net reverses loss.

text.p: (in millions of yuan unless stated, against 1995 figures)
Net asset per share 2.68 yuan vs 2.64 yuan
Earnings per share 0.17 yuan vs 0.0098 yuan
Company name: Shanghai Tyre and Rubber Co Ltd .
Note: the company issued its 1996 annual results in a statement on Wednesday.
The 1996 net profit figure, given by a company spokesman, and the 1995 net figure are based on international accounting standards.
Other figures are based on domestic accounting standards, the statement said.
Based on domestic accounting standards, 1996 net was 140.01 million yuan against 7.92 million yuan in 1995.

The company's board of directors proposed a pre-tax cash dividend of 0.15 yuan per share for all shareholders, pending approval of shareholders in the 1996 annual meeting to be held at a later date, the statement said.
